name: Leaf Mother Laurel
descriptions: Leaf Mother Laurel is the Elder of the Treeminders in Oasis, in the year 2277.

The wife of Tree Father Birch and fellow leader of the people of Oasis, Leaf Mother Laurel spends much of her day wandering around Oasis, tending the plants and flowers, and speaking with the people of the village with her daughter Sapling Yew usually at her side or playing nearby. She believes it is her responsibility to tend to the spiritual and mental well-being of her fellow villagers.
Not much else is known about Leaf Mother Laurel, other than her passion to let the whole Capital Wasteland experience Harold's "gift," contrary to her husband's belief.
Tree Father Birch is her husband and Sapling Yew is her daughter.

Leaf Mother Laurel is always in Oasis. She can be found at the outdoor hut in the mornings, sitting on the middle log. She also wanders around in Oasis and maintains the vegetation. She spends her evenings usually sitting on a stump with her husband and sleeps in a secluded spot with both her husband and child.
Laurel is the common name for Laurus nobilis, a type of tree. All of the human residents in Oasis have horticultural names.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: By insulting the Tree Father, you've insulted us all. You are no longer a guest here. I'd advise you to leave immediately.

topics.topic: MS10FinTLRewardTree Father Birch said you may have a gift for me?
topics.topic_text: You said someone had gifts for me?
topics.response_text: Yes, I believe Branchtender Linden, Bloomseer Poplar and my little Yew mentioned they had some things for you as gifts.

topics.topic_text: I was glad to do it. Oasis needs to be shared with the world.
topics.response_text: In your short visit here I can see you've learned much. That's a rare gift in these turbulent times.

topics.topic_text: Sure, I guess.
topics.response_text: Perhaps you haven't learned quite as much as I hoped from your visit here, but I'm glad to see you made the right choice in the end.

topics.topic_text: I could have used a pile of caps instead, but whatever.
topics.response_text: I'm saddened that worldly possessions and wealth still drive you, but I'm glad to see you made the right choice in the end.

topics.topic_text: Doesn't anybody care what your god thinks?
topics.response_text: Of course we do! He yearns to share His miracles with the whole world... to give the gift of life back to the dead Wasteland!

topics.topic_text: Why don't any of you listen to Harold?
topics.response_text: Of course we do! He yearns to share His miracles with the whole world... to give the gift of life back to the dead Wasteland!

topics.topic_text: This is a waste of my time.
topics.response_text: I can understand your frustration. Seeing Him in so much pain makes me feel a sense of sadness in my heart too.

topics.topic_text: How can I possibly help?
topics.response_text: I heard what my husband wanted you to do. What I propose is an alternative.

topics.topic_text: Uh oh... I see where this is going...
topics.response_text: I heard what my husband wanted you to do. What I propose is an alternative.

topics.topic_text: I give up. Just let me know what you want now.
topics.response_text: I heard what my husband wanted you to do. What I propose is an alternative.

topics.topic_text: Any information you could give me on the caves below Oasis would be helpful.
topics.response_text: If the Great One knows you to be worthy of his grace, he will allow you to pass through to his heart.

topics.topic_text: What will you do now?
topics.response_text: I'll mourn Him with every ounce of my being. This has been a tremendous loss to the world.

topics.topic_text: I have some questions about the task you gave me.
topics.response_text: Certainly, please ask them.

topics.topic_text: Why don't you just travel to Harold's heart on your own?
topics.response_text: The Great One has not yet allowed us entry below ground. We were uncertain as to why until you arrived.

topics.topic: MS10TLTaskTalk03Where did the sap come from?
topics.topic_text: Where did the Liniment come from?
topics.response_text: The Liniment was made by Bloomseer Poplar. Her knowledge of His gifts and how they can be used to help us is nothing short of astounding.

topics.topic_text: Where is the entrance to the caves?
topics.response_text: The entrance to the caves is to the southwest of the Pavilion.

topics.topic: MS10TLTreeminderWhat did you have to do to become a Treeminder?
topics.topic_text: May I ask you about the Treeminders?
topics.response_text: Please, go right ahead.

topics.topic_text: How did the Treeminders begin?
topics.response_text: I'm afraid I can take none of the credit for my husband's creation.

topics.topic_text: How do the Treeminders normally handle other Outsiders?
topics.response_text: Without His blessing, we would not allow an Outsider inside this vale.

topics.topic_text: Could I become a Treeminder?
topics.response_text: Although we would welcome you with open arms, you were obviously drawn here to help us.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to ask about something else.
topics.response_text: Yes?

conversation.response_text: Oasis is no longer a refuge for you, Outsider.
Once again, my husband, we are at an impasse. I suggest we speak to the Outsider.{calming down from argument but still a bit annoyed}
...and, diminishing from day to day, you may disappear; except where you serve the health and good purposes of mankind, may no trace of you be found.
